• Main Page
System
BMA400

API that performs system-level operations.

bma400_soft_reset

int8_t bma400_soft_reset(const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API soft-resets the sensor where all the registers are reset to their default values except 0x4B.
Parameters
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError

bma400_perform_self_test

int8_t bma400_perform_self_test(const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API performs a self test of the accelerometer in BMA400.
Parameters
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Note
The return value of this API is the result of self test. A self test does not soft reset of the sensor. Hence, the user can define the required settings after performing the self test.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError / failure

bma400_get_temperature_data

int8_t bma400_get_temperature_data(int16_t *temperature_data, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to get the temperature data output.
Note
Temperature data output must be divided by a factor of 10 Consider temperature_data = 195 , Then the actual temperature is 19.5 degree Celsius.
Parameters
[in,out]temperature_data: Temperature data
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError
